akn:content.akn:p:
§ 154101. Organization(a) Federal Charter.—Naval Sea Cadet Corps (in this chapter, the “corporation”) is a federally chartered corporation.
(b) Perpetual Existence.—Except as otherwise provided, the corporation has perpetual existence.
(Pub. L. 105–225, Aug. 12, 1998, 112 Stat. 1432.)
Historical and Revision Notes
RevisedSectionSource (U.S. Code)Source (Statutes at Large)
15410136:1041.Sept. 10, 1962, Pub. L. 87–655, §§ 1, 4(1), 76 Stat. 530, 531. 36:1044(1).
This section is substituted for the source provisions for consistency in the revised title and to eliminate unnecessary and executed words.
(a) Naval Sea Cadet Corps (in this chapter, the “corporation”) is a federally chartered corporation.
(b) Except as otherwise provided, the corporation has perpetual existence.
